text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends At least Biden shows he have heart, you on the other hand killed about 127.000 people on the coronavirus pandemic and it’s still climbing. You saying that the system is broken and will bring million of people to the US. Well guess what? You already broke the system no thanks to u
